title: The Case Against Adnan Syed - Episode 2 – In Between The Truth
description:
March 18, 2019 / Susan, Colin, and Rabia break down episode 2 of the docuseries, which brings the audience up to speed and introduces new voices to the case.  

Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes and Spencer Burdette.

This episode was sponsored by InstaCart, ZipRecruiter, and Stamps.

InstaCart.com (or download app) and enter promo code UNDISCLOSED at checkout.

ZipRecruiter.com/undisclosed

Stamps.com enter UNDISCLOSED when clicking on mic at top of homepage

#undisclosed #freeadnan #justiceforhae
